Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checking, Savings
public abstract class Account extends Object
This class is an ABSTRACT Account class. This includes the most inclusive data of any type of accounts. Parent class that generalizes an account.
Author:
Minseok Park, Amogh Sarangdhar

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account​(String fname, String lname, String dob, double balance)
      Parametrized constructor to create an Account for GUI program This takes a firstname, lastname, dob, as strings, and balance as double.
      Parameters:
      fname - first name of the holder.
      lname - last name of the holder.
      dob - date of birth of the holder.
      balance - balance in the account of the holder.

    • Account

      public Account​(String transaction)
      Parametrized constructor for Account that takes an input String from terminal, and tokenizes it. Checks if the first token equals "0", "D", "W", then open, deposits, and withdraws accordingly.
      Parameters:
      transaction - takes inputString from the terminal for any Account.

  • Method Details

    • userInput_ODW

      private void userInput_ODW​(StringTokenizer st)
      Tokenizes the string input accordingly from the terminal when the user inputs "O", "D", "W".
      Parameters:
      st - takes in the string tokens.

    • userInput_C

      private void userInput_C​(StringTokenizer st)
      Tokenizes the string input accordingly from the terminal when the user inputs "C".
      Parameters:
      st - takes in the string tokens.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)
      Checks if two accounts are equal or not.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - of type Account.
      Returns:
      true if two Accounts are equal, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      String representation of Account class, depending on whether the account is closed or not.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String for an Account.

    • isValid_O

      public boolean isValid_O()
      Check validity of an opening transaction (abstract Account)
      Returns:
      false, if it has invalid profile/balance; true, otherwise

    • isValid_C

      public boolean isValid_C()
      Check validity of a closing transaction (abstract Account)
      Returns:
      false, if it has invalid profile; true, otherwise

    • isValid_WD

      public boolean isValid_WD()
      Check validity of a withdrawing/depositing transaction (abstract Account)
      Returns:
      false, if it has invalid profile/balance; true, otherwise

    • setClosedBalance

      public void setClosedBalance()
      Sets the balance of the closed account to 0.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw​(double amount)
      The amount of money that is to be withdrawn from the Account.
      Parameters:
      amount - money to be withdrawn.

    • deposit

      public void deposit​(double amount)
      The amount of money that is to be deposited into the Account (abstract Account)
      Parameters:
      amount - money to be deposited.

    • updateBalance

      public void updateBalance()
      Method to update the balance of the Account holder. Calculates balance after reducing the fee and adding the monthly interest.

    • monthlyInterest

      public abstract double monthlyInterest()
      Abstract method for monthly interest of the Account.
      Returns:
      the monthly interest of the Account.

    • fee

      public abstract double fee()
      Abstract method for fees of the Account.
      Returns:
      fees of the Account.

    • getType

      public abstract String getType()
      Abstract method for the type of the Account.
      Returns:
      the type of the Account (Checking, College Checking, Savings, Money Market Savings).

    • getTypeCode

      public abstract int getTypeCode()
      Abstract method for getting the type code of the Account.
      Returns:
      the type code of the Account (1= Checking, 2= College Checking, 3=Money Market, 4=Savings).

    • getHolder

      public Profile getHolder()
      Getter for Account holder.
      Returns:
      Profile of the account holder.

    • isClosed

      public boolean isClosed()
      Checks if the Account is closed or not.
      Returns:
      true if the Account is closed, false otherwise.

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Getter for the balance in the Account.
      Returns:
      the current balance of the Account.
